trans-unit.source: OctoPrint's development wouldn't be possible without the financial support by its community. If you enjoy OctoPrint, please consider becoming a regular supporter!
trans-unit.target: OctoPrint's development wouldn't be possible without the financial support by its community. If you enjoy OctoPrint, please consider becoming a regular supporter!

trans-unit.source: A comprehensive overview of all available configuration settings can be found in the docs. Please note that the most commonly used configuration settings can also easily be edited from OctoPrint's settings dialog.
trans-unit.target: A comprehensive overview of all available configuration settings can be found in the docs. Please note that the most commonly used configuration settings can also easily be edited from OctoPrint's settings dialog.

trans-unit.source: After installation, please make sure you follow the first-run wizard and set up access control as necessary.
trans-unit.target: После установки убедитесь,что Вы следуете инструкциям мастера первого запуска и при необходимости установите контроль доступа.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the host and port on which to bind can be defined via the config file.
trans-unit.target: В качестве альтернативы,хост и порт,на который можно установить привязку,можно определить с помощью конфигурационного файла.

trans-unit.source: An invite to the Discord server can be found at discord.octoprint.org.
trans-unit.target: An invite to the Discord server can be found at discord.octoprint.org.

trans-unit.source: By default it binds to all interfaces on port 5000 (so pointing your browser to http://127.0.0.1:5000 will do the trick). If you want to change that, use the additional command line parameters host and port, which accept the host ip to bind to and the numeric port number respectively. If for example you want the server to only listen on the local interface on port 8080, the command line would be
trans-unit.target: By default it binds to all interfaces on port 5000 (so pointing your browser to http://127.0.0.1:5000 will do the trick). If you want to change that, use the additional command line parameters host and port , which accept the host ip to bind to and the numeric port number respectively. If for example you want the server to only listen on the local interface on port 8080, the command line would be

trans-unit.source: Change into the OctoPrint folder: cd OctoPrint
trans-unit.target: Change into the OctoPrint folder: cd OctoPrint

trans-unit.source: Checkout OctoPrint: git clone https://github.com/OctoPrint/OctoPrint.git
trans-unit.target: Checkout OctoPrint: git clone https://github.com/OctoPrint/OctoPrint.git

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: Конфигурация

trans-unit.source: Contributing
trans-unit.target: Вклад

trans-unit.source: Contributions of all kinds are welcome, not only in the form of code but also with regards to the official documentation, debugging help in the bug tracker, support of other users on the community forum at community.octoprint.org or the official discord at discord.octoprint.org and also financially.
trans-unit.target: Contributions of all kinds are welcome, not only in the form of code but also with regards to the official documentation, debugging help in the bug tracker, support of other users on the community forum at community.octoprint.org or the official discord at discord.octoprint.org and also financially.

trans-unit.source: Create a user-owned virtual environment therein: virtualenv venv
trans-unit.target: Create a user-owned virtual environment therein: virtualenv venv

trans-unit.source: Create a user-owned virtual environment therein: virtualenv venv. If you want to specify a specific python to use instead of whatever version your system defaults to, you can also explicitly require that via the --python parameter, e.g. virtualenv --python=python3 venv.
trans-unit.target: Create a user-owned virtual environment therein: virtualenv venv . If you want to specify a specific python to use instead of whatever version your system defaults to, you can also explicitly require that via the --python parameter, e.g. virtualenv --python=python3 venv .

trans-unit.source: Cross-browser testing services are kindly provided by BrowserStack.
trans-unit.target: Cross-browser testing services are kindly provided by BrowserStack.

trans-unit.source: Dependencies
trans-unit.target: Зависимости

trans-unit.source: Error tracking is powered and sponsored by Sentry.
trans-unit.target: Error tracking is powered and sponsored by Sentry.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to go about submitting bug reports or pull requests, please see the project's Contribution Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to go about submitting bug reports or pull requests, please see the project's Contribution Guidelines.

trans-unit.source: If not specified via the command line, the config file config.yaml for OctoPrint is expected in the settings folder, which is located at ~/.octoprint on Linux, at %APPDATA%/OctoPrint on Windows and at ~/Library/Application Support/OctoPrint on MacOS.
trans-unit.target: If not specified via the command line, the config file config.yaml for OctoPrint is expected in the settings folder, which is located at ~/.octoprint on Linux, at %APPDATA%/OctoPrint on Windows and at ~/Library/Application Support/OctoPrint on MacOS.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a custom pidfile location via --pid PIDFILE, it will be created at /tmp/octoprint.pid.
trans-unit.target: If you do not supply a custom pidfile location via --pid PIDFILE , it will be created at /tmp/octoprint.pid .

trans-unit.source: If you think something is bad about OctoPrint or its documentation the way it is, please help in any way to make it better instead of just complaining about it -- this is an Open Source Project after all :)
trans-unit.target: Если вы считаете,что что-то плохое в OctoPrint или в его документации так,как оно есть,пожалуйста,помогите каким-либо образом сделать его лучше,а не просто жаловаться на него-это все-таки Open Source Project :)

trans-unit.source: If you want to run OctoPrint as a daemon (only supported on Linux), use
trans-unit.target: Если вы хотите запустить OctoPrint в качестве демона (поддерживается только под Linux),используйте

trans-unit.source: If you want to run OctoPrint on a Raspberry Pi, you might want to take a look at OctoPi which is a custom SD card image that includes OctoPrint plus dependencies.
trans-unit.target: If you want to run OctoPrint on a Raspberry Pi, you might want to take a look at OctoPi which is a custom SD card image that includes OctoPrint plus dependencies.

trans-unit.source: Install OctoPrint into that virtual environment: ./venv/bin/pip install .
trans-unit.target: Install OctoPrint into that virtual environment: ./venv/bin/pip install .

trans-unit.source: Install OctoPrint into that virtual environment: ./venv/bin/pip install OctoPrint
trans-unit.target: Install OctoPrint into that virtual environment: ./venv/bin/pip install OctoPrint

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Установка

trans-unit.source: Installation instructions for installing from source for different operating systems can be found on the forum.
trans-unit.target: Installation instructions for installing from source for different operating systems can be found on the forum.

trans-unit.source: Its website can be found at octoprint.org.
trans-unit.target: Its website can be found at octoprint.org.

trans-unit.source: OctoPrint
trans-unit.target: OctoPrint

trans-unit.source: OctoPrint also ships with a run script in its source directory. You can invoke it to start the server. It takes the same command line arguments as the octoprint script.
trans-unit.target: OctoPrint also ships with a run script in its source directory. You can invoke it to start the server. It takes the same command line arguments as the octoprint script.

trans-unit.source: OctoPrint currently supports Python 2.7, 3.6 and 3.7.
trans-unit.target: OctoPrint в настоящее время поддерживает Python 2.7,3.6 и 3.7.

trans-unit.source: OctoPrint depends on a few python modules to do its job. Those are automatically installed when installing OctoPrint via pip.
trans-unit.target: OctoPrint depends on a few python modules to do its job. Those are automatically installed when installing OctoPrint via pip .

trans-unit.source: OctoPrint provides a snappy web interface for controlling consumer 3D printers. It is Free Software and released under the GNU Affero General Public License V3.
trans-unit.target: OctoPrint provides a snappy web interface for controlling consumer 3D printers. It is Free Software and released under the GNU Affero General Public License V3.

trans-unit.source: Or alternatively, for an install from source:
trans-unit.target: Или,наоборот,для установки из источника:

trans-unit.source: Profiling is done with the help of PyVmMonitor.
trans-unit.target: Profiling is done with the help of PyVmMonitor.

trans-unit.source: Running the pip install via
trans-unit.target: Выполнение установки трубопровода через

trans-unit.source: See octoprint --help for more information on the available command line parameters.
trans-unit.target: See octoprint --help for more information on the available command line parameters.

trans-unit.source: Special Thanks
trans-unit.target: Отдельная благодарность

trans-unit.source: The FAQ can be accessed by following faq.octoprint.org.
trans-unit.target: The FAQ can be accessed by following faq.octoprint.org.

trans-unit.source: The community forum is available at community.octoprint.org. It also serves as central knowledge base.
trans-unit.target: The community forum is available at community.octoprint.org. It also serves as central knowledge base.

trans-unit.source: The documentation is located at docs.octoprint.org.
trans-unit.target: The documentation is located at docs.octoprint.org.

trans-unit.source: The generic steps that should basically be done regardless of operating system and runtime environment are the following (as regular user, please keep your hands off of the sudo command here!) - this assumes you already have Python 2.7, 3.6 or 3.7, pip and virtualenv and their dependencies set up on your system:

trans-unit.source: The official plugin repository can be reached at plugins.octoprint.org.
trans-unit.target: The official plugin repository can be reached at plugins.octoprint.org.

trans-unit.source: The snappy web interface for your 3D printer
trans-unit.target: Молниеносный веб-интерфейс для вашего 3D-принтера

trans-unit.target: To start OctoPrint in safe mode - which disables all third party plugins that do not come bundled with OctoPrint - use the --safe flag:

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Использование

trans-unit.source: You are currently looking at the source code repository of OctoPrint. If you already installed it (e.g. by using the Raspberry Pi targeted distribution OctoPi) and only want to find out how to use it, the documentation might be of more interest for you. You might also want to subscribe to join the community forum at community.octoprint.org where there are other active users who might be able to help you with any questions you might have.
trans-unit.target: You are currently looking at the source code repository of OctoPrint. If you already installed it (e.g. by using the Raspberry Pi targeted distribution OctoPi) and only want to find out how to use it, the documentation might be of more interest for you. You might also want to subscribe to join the community forum at community.octoprint.org where there are other active users who might be able to help you with any questions you might have.

trans-unit.source: You can start the server via
trans-unit.target: Вы можете запустить сервер через

trans-unit.source: You may then start the OctoPrint server via /path/to/OctoPrint/venv/bin/octoprint, see Usage for details.
trans-unit.target: You may then start the OctoPrint server via /path/to/OctoPrint/venv/bin/octoprint , see Usage for details.

trans-unit.source: installs the octoprint script in your Python installation's scripts folder (which, depending on whether you installed OctoPrint globally or into a virtual env, will be in your PATH or not). The following usage examples assume that the octoprint script is on your PATH.
trans-unit.target: installs the octoprint script in your Python installation's scripts folder (which, depending on whether you installed OctoPrint globally or into a virtual env, will be in your PATH or not). The following usage examples assume that the octoprint script is on your PATH .
